prompts: Create a playful grass-type Pokemon with a spiky green head and small brown limbs.
Imagine a cheerful Pokemon that loves to explore forests and has a nature theme.
Generate a cute, small Pokemon that has a brown body and green accents.
Design a starter Pokemon that resembles a small creature with plant-like features.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon with a green leafy hairstyle and a mischievous grin.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in grassy environments and has a vibrant color palette.
Give me an adorable Pokemon that is known for its curious and adventurous personality.
